AlcoholExperience.History: Mount Gay is a brand of rum produced in Barbados. It is one of the oldest rum brands in the world, with origins dating back to 1703. Mount Gay is known for its smooth and complex flavor profile, making it a favorite among rum enthusiasts worldwide.

Taste.Description: Rich with notes of caramel, vanilla, and tropical fruits.

Details.ServingSuggestions: Best enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in classic cocktails like Mojito, Daiquiri, or Rum Punch.
